main event: Two small, colored lights were sighted emitting no sound and moving up and down on August 31, 1952, in Loomis, California.
interesting points: The lights were colored red, blue, and white and emitted no sound as they moved.
The sighting occurred twice between the hours of 0422 and 2522 PDT.
Observers located at COC posts between Newcastle and Roseville, California, estimated the objects' altitude at 5,000-6,000 ft.
The observers were located in Loomis, California.
The report indicates clear weather and no external factors that could have caused the sighting.
sighted object: two small, colored lights moving up and down emitting no sound
